Browser Extension for Downloading Videos and Photos from Facebook and Instagram with One Click

Looking for a quick and easy way to download videos, stories, and photos from Facebook and Instagram? Our browser extension is the perfect solution for you. With its powerful features, you can download any video or photo from these popular social platforms in just one click.

Easily Download Videos from Facebook

One of the standout features of our extension is its ability to download videos from Facebook with just one click. No need for complicated websites or bulky software anymore! You can download any video you like directly from Facebook while browsing, and it will be saved on your device in the highest possible quality.

Quickly Download Facebook Stories

Facebook stories capture fleeting yet memorable moments from your friends or favorite pages. With this extension, you can easily download Facebook stories in seconds. Simply click the download button, and your favorite stories will be saved instantly for you to view anytime.

Download Photos and Videos from Instagram

Instagram is known for its high-quality photos and videos, and our extension makes it super simple to download Instagram photos and videos. Whether it’s an artistic photo or an inspiring short video, you can grab them all with a single click, making it easier than ever to keep the content you love.

Key Features

	•	User-friendly interface.
	•	Fast downloads with high-quality results.
	•	Completely free and secure.

This browser extension helps you save amazing moments from Facebook and Instagram with a single, effortless click. Install it today and start enjoying the convenience of instant downloads!

Story Saver allows you to save photos and videos stories.

All you have to do is installing this extension, an icon will appear at the top-left corner of the browser,
Click on that icon and whoosh the story will be downloaded, Oh and another thing the extension will rename the story to something readable ;)
